attributes.background: ULHT wants to close Grantham A&E from 5pm to 9am in the morning. Emergencies will be re-directed to Lincoln and Nottingham meaning that precious minutes will be lost for anyone requiring emergency treatment since these journeys can take over 40 minutes. Save our lives and loved ones.

rejection.details: This is the responsibility of United Lincolnshire Hospitals NHS Trust, not the UK Government or Parliament.
